_text_: IN CONSIDERATION OF THE PRESIDENT OF INDIA THROUGH THE COMMISSIONER OF CUSTOMS, NHAVASHEVA HAVING AGREED TO ACCEPT A BANK GAURANTEE FOR 20% OF THE DIFFERENCE IN AMOUNT BETWEEN THE TARIFF RATE OF DUTY AND EFFECTIVE RATE OF DUTY FROM (BANK DETAILS............................................................................................). AT THE REQUEST OF (CONSIGNEE..............................................) DO HEREBY UNDERTAKE TO PAY TO THE COMMISSIONER OF CUSTOMS, NAHAVSHEVA AN AMOUNT NOT EXCEEDING CONSOLIDATED TO Rs................. AGAINST ANY LOSS OR DAMAGE CAUSED TO OR SUFFERED BY OR THAT WOULD BE CAUSED TO OR BE SUFFERED BY THE GOVERNMENT OF INDIA (THE COMMISSIONER OF CUSTOMS) BY REASON OF ANY BREACH BY THE SAID IMPORTER OF ANY OF THE TERMS OR CONDITION CONTAINED IN THE BOND SUBMITTED TO YOU BY THE IMPORTER OR BY REASON OF THE IMPORTER FAILURE TO PERFORM THE SAID AGREEMENT. THAT, IF THIS GAURANTEE IS NOT RENEWED FOR ANY REASON WHATSOEVER, ON OR BEFORE THE EXPIRY OF THIS GAURANTEE, ENTIRE AMOUNT GAURANTEED SHALL BECOME FOR WITH DUE AND PAYABLE TO THE GOVERNMENT AND THE BANK SHALL PAY THE AMOUNT WITHOUT ANY DEMUR. WE (BANK NAME AND ADDRESS) LASTLY UNDERTAKE NOT TO REVOKE THE GAURANTEE EXCEPT WITH THE PREVIOUS CONSENT OF THE COMMISSIONER OF CUSTOMS, NHAVASHEVA, IN WRITING. WE, (BANK NAME AND ADDRESS) DO HEREBY UNDERTAKE TO PAY THE AMOUNT DUE AND PAYAB;E UNDER THIS GUARANTEE WITHOUT ANY DEMUR HEREBY ON A DEMAND FROM THE THE COMMISSIONER OF CUSTOMS, NHAVASHEVA STATING THAT THE AMOUNT CLAIMED IS DUE BY WAY OF LOSS OR DAMAGE CAUSED TO OR THAT WOULD BE CAUSED TO OR BE SUFFERED BY THE COMMISSIONER OF CUSTOMS, NHAVASHEVA BY REASON OF BREACH BY THE SAID IMPORTER OF ANY OF THIS TERMS OR CONDITION CONTAIN IN THE EXECUTED BOND.
name: kony.ui.Label
